content:
That sounds like a great starting point for my client tracker! I think I'll add a section for tracking client communication, like emails and meetings, to ensure I don't miss any important updates or deadlines. I'd also like to include a space for notes and feedback from clients, so I can refer back to them later.

By the way, I've been enjoying learning Japanese in my spare time, and I think I'll create a separate section in my bullet journal for language learning. Do you have any tips for creating a language learning tracker or spread?
